item.title: Hindustan Zinc Ltd Hits Intraday Low Amid Price Pressure on 29 Dec 2025
item.description: Hindustan Zinc Ltd experienced a notable intraday decline on 29 Dec 2025, with the stock touching a low of Rs. 614.75, marking a 3.46% drop from its previous close. Despite opening with a gap-up and reaching a new 52-week high, the stock succumbed to selling pressure, underperforming its sector and the broader market amid cautious sentiment. Time: 24 minutes ago
